list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Remove outdated test report file and finalize CLI, report testing suite
- Deleted `FINAL_TEST_REPORT.md` as it is no longer relevant. - Added a comprehensive test suite for all CLI commands in `test_all_cli_commands.py`. - Introduced enhanced report testing in `test_report.py` with goal comparisons, daily breakdowns, and tracking consistency. - Fixed typo in `update_food_entry_cmd` function name for better clarity. - Updated `run_tests.py` to simplify test execution and suppress warnings. - Modified `pytest.ini` for more precise warning handling and test configurations. - Included additional database changes for robust testing.

project.component: { "keyToString": { "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "ModuleVcsDetector.initialDetectionPerformed": "true", "Python tests.Python tests in test_db.py.executor": "Debug", "Python.user.executor": "Run", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.git.unshallow": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "#4 on feat/crud-actions", "junie.onboarding.icon.badge.shown": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "/home/codegoddy/PycharmProjects/health_tracker_cli_app", "node.js.detected.package.eslint": "true", "node.js.detected.package.tslint": "true", "node.js.selected.package.eslint": "(autodetect)", "node.js.selected.package.tslint": "(autodetect)", "nodejs_package_manager_path": "npm", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "preferences.pluginManager", "vue.rearranger.settings.migration": "true" } }

task.summary:
Refactor and update testing suite, CLI functionality, and report generation logic
- Redesigned the testing suite to focus on essential tests (core, CLI, and report generation). - Simplified test running commands in documentation and updated pytest configuration. - Enhanced CLI report output with detailed statistics, goal comparisons, and daily breakdowns. - Overhauled `report_controller` logic to include tracking consistency, goal percentage comparisons, and daily averages. - Removed obsolete testing documentation, redundant tests, and outdated files for improved maintenance.

Remove outdated test report file and finalize CLI, report testing suite
- Deleted `FINAL_TEST_REPORT.md` as it is no longer relevant. - Added a comprehensive test suite for all CLI commands in `test_all_cli_commands.py`. - Introduced enhanced report testing in `test_report.py` with goal comparisons, daily breakdowns, and tracking consistency. - Fixed typo in `update_food_entry_cmd` function name for better clarity. - Updated `run_tests.py` to simplify test execution and suppress warnings. - Modified `pytest.ini` for more precise warning handling and test configurations. - Included additional database changes for robust testing.

MESSAGE.value: Add testing report paths to ChangeListManager for better tracking

Refactor and update testing suite, CLI functionality, and report generation logic
- Redesigned the testing suite to focus on essential tests (core, CLI, and report generation). - Simplified test running commands in documentation and updated pytest configuration. - Enhanced CLI report output with detailed statistics, goal comparisons, and daily breakdowns. - Overhauled `report_controller` logic to include tracking consistency, goal percentage comparisons, and daily averages. - Removed obsolete testing documentation, redundant tests, and outdated files for improved maintenance.

Remove outdated test report file and finalize CLI, report testing suite
- Deleted `FINAL_TEST_REPORT.md` as it is no longer relevant. - Added a comprehensive test suite for all CLI commands in `test_all_cli_commands.py`. - Introduced enhanced report testing in `test_report.py` with goal comparisons, daily breakdowns, and tracking consistency. - Fixed typo in `update_food_entry_cmd` function name for better clarity. - Updated `run_tests.py` to simplify test execution and suppress warnings. - Modified `pytest.ini` for more precise warning handling and test configurations. - Included additional database changes for robust testing.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Remove outdated test report file and finalize CLI, report testing suite
- Deleted `FINAL_TEST_REPORT.md` as it is no longer relevant. - Added a comprehensive test suite for all CLI commands in `test_all_cli_commands.py`. - Introduced enhanced report testing in `test_report.py` with goal comparisons, daily breakdowns, and tracking consistency. - Fixed typo in `update_food_entry_cmd` function name for better clarity. - Updated `run_tests.py` to simplify test execution and suppress warnings. - Modified `pytest.ini` for more precise warning handling and test configurations. - Included additional database changes for robust testing.
